Pre-Game Insights: The Kansas City Royals and Houston Astros meet in a crucial game with the Astros starting Yusei Kikuchi and the Royals starting Cole Ragans.

The game is significant in the context of their rivalry and playoff push.
Others: The Astros' Yusei Kikuchi has shown inconsistent performance in his last starts, while Cole Ragans has been more reliable for the Royals.
